data.title: All About Papercutting
data.text:
New Paper Animation by Wolfgang Matzl.

Hello! Today I’m excited to share a new short and mysterious animation by Wolfgang Matzl. It’s done with paper cut-outs, combined with objects such as a metal can, wire, and a hook. This animation is called Fisher’s Fritz and is a fictitious commercial....

Paper Stop Animation by Wolfgang Matzl.

* ALERT. Moderate horror. In this short movie, Wolfgang Matzl used paper cut-outs to bring an old school-book and its illustrations to life. He did a wonderful job. It amazes me how expressive paper can be as a medium. I invite you to visit the artist’s website...

PROTEIGON. A Clever Stop Animation Movie by Burayan.

Steven Briand, aka BURAYAN, is a young Director, working in live action as well as animation and mixed techniques. I love this stop animation movie directed by him, called PROTEIGON. The music is great as well. PROTEIGON from BURAYAN on Vimeo. Directed by Steven...

Flower/Heart Paper Sculpture.

Hello! This is part of a commission that I am working on for Ebony, the magazine. It is a combination of a heart and a flower. Inside the piece goes a couple holding hands. The work as a whole is not finished yet, but I wanted to show you how I made the flower. Maybe...

The Seed. A Beautiful Paper Animation.

Directed by Johnny Kelly, with paper models by super talented Elin Svensson, The Seed is a two-minute animated voyage through nature’s life cycle, following the trials and tribulations of a humble apple seed. I invite you to watch this beautiful movie below....

Big Green Idea. A Paper Animation by MaricorMaricar.

This animation was created to help launch the British Council Australia’s Big Green Idea award for 2011. It took under two weeks to create the props, shoot the stop motion and finish off the post. That was a lot of work to do in two weeks! Great job,...

A Horrific Pop-Up Book that Makes you Smile. By Marek Cina.

* Marek Cina is an artist from Bratislava-mesto, Slovakia. I love the cleverness of this pop-up book that he created. It is black humor at its finest. :) To see more projects by Marek, you can visit his Behance portfolio. MAREK CINA – POP-UP BOOK from enrik...

Nina McSweeney. Lost in Translation.

Today I’m sharing a video with Nina McSweeney that contains papercut elements. Enjoy it! Photo from Brooke Tyson. A Lense Flare production, in association with Fleet Street Productions and Spectrum. Directed by Jared Kahi & Johnny Barker....

Josh Ritter – Love Is Making Its Way Back Home

Thanks, Janet Mohler, for letting me know about this beautiful stop-motion animation music video. This video was created with over 12,000 pieces of construction paper, shown as it was shot, with no effects added in post. Director : Erez Horovitz Concept : Sam Cohen +...

Les Trois Inventeurs (1980) by Michel Ocelot.

Share this...

New Zealand Book Council – Going West

I just had to post this paper animation because it is absolutely remarkable. I got the link from Lina. Thank you so much, Lina! I can only imagine the amount of work that this short required. After seeing all the expressive possibilities of stop-motion animation I...

Extrait de ‹ Les Trois Inventeurs ›

Isn’t this paper animation amazing? This is a short film by Michel Ocelot. It was completed when I was only 8 years old (1979). How about the music? I think that it is mesmerizing. I wish that I could watch the entire movie! I won’t stop until I find the...
